verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I Search for You, God of Strength
I bow to You, in brokeness.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
No other King could have so humbly come,
To save my soul and heal my heart.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I have nothing more, than all You offer me.
There is nothing else, thats of worth to me.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I love you Lord, You rescued me.
You are all that I want, Your all that I need.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I pray to You, God of peace.
I rest in You, my cares released.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
In Your freedom, I will live, In Your freedom I will live
I offer devotion, I offer devotion.
